description: Governments heading to the UN COP30 climate summit in Brazil are bracing for the possibility that the Trump administration may seek to disrupt negotiations at the event, even without any US officials showing up.

title: Meta earning a fortune on fraudulent ads, internal documents show
creator: The Star Online
description: Nov 6 (Reuters): Meta internally projected late last year that it would earn about 10% of its overall annual revenue - or US$16bil - from running advertising for scams and banned goods, internal company documents show. Read full story

title: China's exports fall for first time in eight months
creator: RTÉ News
description: China's exports fell in October for the first time in eight months, official data showed today, as trade tensions flared in the weeks before Chinese President Xi Jinping met US counterpart Donald Trump.
